name: R00000
description:
Weekend Warriors is a small and young independent games collective from Vilnius, Lithuania.

  • Game design - Povilas Vincentas Jankūnas
  • Programming - Karolis Dikčius
  • Sounds & Music - Ignas Čeponis

Follow us on Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/weekend.warriors.studio/
Follow us on Twitter - https://twitter.com/W_W_Studio
